annotations.description: The Return Of Triple Syrup! What makes me so excited about this syrup is that it has so many practical applications that cab be added to your home bar or act...
annotations.title: The Return Of Triple Syrup With The Yuzu Gimlet!

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Gin
1oz (30ml) Triple Syrup
.5oz (15ml) Lime Juice
.25oz (7.5ml) Yuzu Juice

Shake/Strain/Coupe
Garnish Shiso leaf and Thin sliced Lime Wheel

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WHPHjDkkT3g
title: Yuzu Gimlet
